title: Android 14 & Android 15, Target Acquired
energy_text: 2()
skills_text:
If your Leader Card is yellow or an 《Android》 card, reduce the combo cost of this card in your hand by 1.
If your opponent has 2 or more energy : When this card is played, look at up to 10 cards from the top of your deck, play up to 1 ＜Android 13＞ card with an energy cost of 4 or less among them with its skills negated for the turn, then shuffle your deck.

title: Heroines' Lineage
skills_text:
, remove this card in your Drop Area from the game : Choose any number of 《Heroine》 cards in your hand with energy costs of 5 or less and different card names whose energy costs add up to a total of 10 or less and play them; choose up to 1 of those cards and it gets +5000 power for the turn.
If your opponent has 3 or more energy : Choose 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards with an energy cost of 7 or less and gain control of it.
